articles.title: Consumer Reports Worried Tesla Could Spy on Customers
articles.description: Consumer Reports has taken umbrage with Tesla’s new cabin camera designed to monitor the driver by suggesting there might be some privacy concerns. While that sounds like the understatement of the year, we’ve seen other companies (e.g. Cadillac) deploy simila…

articles.author: verko@corp.ixbt.com (VerKo)
articles.title: Как работает одно из самых спорных новшеств Tesla последнего времени
articles.description:
Когда компания Tesla представила новый дизайн Model S и Model X в январе 2021 года, одним из самых значимых изменений стал отказ от переключателя передач или режимов, ранее расположенного на руле.   
 Вместо переключателя предлагается положиться на автоматик…

articles.author: insider@insider.com (Carla Mozée)
articles.title: Data suggest retail investors have gone into 'hibernation' and the pause could put crypto stocks and reopening trades at risk, Vanda Research says
articles.description: Retail investors are lagging the S&P 500's performance, leaving them reluctant to pour their $1,400 stimulus checks into stocks, says one firm.
articles.content: Retail investors have been slowing their purchases of US equities and the pause could prompt a pullback in cryptocurrency proxies and in shares of companies set to benefit from the economy's rebound … [+2170 chars]
